Pataka Rauranga - Māori Data Hub

Pātaka Raraunga

A place to find data for and about Māori

Improve Māori wellbeing through
informed decisions

To work towards a better future, we also need to understand how and why the world is changing. Data is a vital tool to help us understand, measure, manage, and assess issues and the impact of the changes we make.

Pataka Rauranga brings together data, tools, and reports on Te Ao Māori. You can access data from reputable sources that is free for you to take and use.

  1. Explore topics and charts

    See interactive charts, data sources, definitions, and how and why data was collected. Take and use charts and data for free.

  2. Try out tools

    Use interactive data tools to examine issues like the impacts of COVID-19 on different types of jobs.

  3. Read reports and presentations

    Get information that supports your use of data and provides a deeper understanding of te Ao Māori through the lens of data

If you have questions, feedback, or can’t find the data you’re looking for, email data@figure.nz
